Changelog of megrok.strictrequire
=================================

0.3 (2010-05-18)
----------------

- Test-requirements have been fixed. They formally include zope.app.testing for
  the moment.

0.2 (2009-06-22)
----------------

- Check ViewletManager and Viewlet components too.

0.1 (2009-06-18)
----------------

- Initial release.
